imageAlt: A person doing a mountain pose
title: Mountain Pose
description: Stand tall with feet together and hands at your sides.

imageAlt: A person doing a downward facing dog pose
title: Downward Facing Dog
description: Form an inverted V with hands and feet on the mat, hips raised.

imageAlt: A person doing a plank pose
title: Plank Pose
description: Keep body in a straight line from head to heels, supported on hands and toes.

imageAlt: A person doing a cobra pose
title: Cobra Pose
description: Lie face down, lift chest off the ground with the help of arms.

imageAlt: A person doing a tree pose
title: Tree Pose
description: Stand on one leg, placing the foot of the other leg on the inner thigh.

imageAlt: A person doing a warrior I pose
title: Warrior I
description: Lunge with one foot forward, raise arms overhead.

imageAlt: A person doing a warrior II pose
title: Warrior II
description: Lunge with one foot forward, extend arms out to the sides.

imageAlt: A person doing a triangle pose
title: Triangle Pose
description: Extend one arm to the ground, the other towards the sky, forming a triangle.

imageAlt: A person doing a seated forward bend pose
title: Seated Forward Bend
description: Sit with legs extended, bend forward to touch feet.

imageAlt: A person doing a bridge pose
title: Bridge Pose
description: Lie on back, lift hips with feet and shoulders on the ground.

imageAlt: A person doing a child's pose
title: Child's Pose
description: Kneel, sit back on heels, extend arms forward on the mat.

imageAlt: A person doing a cat-cow pose
title: Cat-Cow Pose
description: Alternate between arching and rounding your back.

imageAlt: A person doing a corpse pose
title: Corpse Pose
description: Lie on back, arms at sides, legs relaxed.

imageAlt: A person doing a half lord of the fishes pose
title: Half Lord of the Fishes Pose
description: Sit with one leg bent, the other leg crossed over it, twist to the side.

imageAlt: A person doing a head to knee pose
title: Head to Knee Pose
description: Sit with one leg extended, bend forward to touch the foot.

imageAlt: A person doing a happy baby pose
title: Happy Baby Pose
description: Lie on back, hold feet with hands, knees bent.

imageAlt: A person doing a garland pose
title: Garland Pose
description: Squat with feet close, hands in prayer position.

imageAlt: A person doing a low lunge pose
title: Low Lunge
description: Lunge forward with one foot, knee on the ground.

imageAlt: A person doing a standing forward bend pose
title: Standing Forward Bend
description: Stand with feet together, bend forward to touch the ground.

imageAlt: A person doing a extended side angle pose
title: Extended Side Angle
description: Lunge with one foot, extend the opposite arm over the ear.
